channel.title: Benchmarking on Alex Pliutau
channel.description: Recent content in Benchmarking on Alex Pliutau

item.title: Measure performance changes with benchcmp
item.description: go test -bench=. Go has a great option to write your benchmarks and run it together with go test with option -bench. To create a benchmark function you must do the following: package anonymizer import "testing" func BenchmarkAnonymizerShortString(b *testing.B) { for n := 0; n < b.N; n++ { Anonymizer("This is a secret message with my private email john@gmail.com") } } func BenchmarkAnonymizerLongString(b *testing.B) { for n := 0; n < b.
